verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> Then I <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G285>sand<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G2342>beast<s%> coming <S%G305>up<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1909>On<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> were <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G1238>crowns,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>heads,<s%> <S%G988>blasphemous<s%> <S%G3686>names.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon,<s%> <S%G3739>because<s%> he <S%G1325>gave<s%> his <S%G1849>authority<s%> to the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> the <S%G2342>beast?<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> to make <S%G4170>war<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him?<s%>"

<S%G1536>If<s%> anyone is to <S%G4863>go<s%> into <S%G161>captivity,<s%> he will <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G161>captivity.<s%> <S%G1536>If<s%> anyone is to be <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3162><s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G3162>sword,<s%> he <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G615>killed.<s%> <S%G5602>Here<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G5281>endurance<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of the <S%G40>saints.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G4160>performs<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4592>signs,<s%> <S%G2443><s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G3772>sky<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G444>people.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G4105>deceives<s%> my own people who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G1325>granted<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> in <S%G1799>front<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast;<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to those who <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> that they should <S%G4160>make<s%> an <S%G1504>image<s%> to the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G3162>sword<s%> <S%G4127>wound<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2198>lived.<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G1410>would<s%> be able to <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G4453>sell,<s%> unless <S%G1508>he<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> that <S%G5480>mark,<s%> <S%G2228><s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name.<s%>
